detail_desc: Slim-fit jeans in washed superstretch denim with hard-worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y) and zip fly and press-stud. Fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Small imitation leather shoulder bag with a narrow, adjustable shoulder strap and flap with a metal decoration and magnetic fastening. Lined. Size 16x23 cm.

Set with a pair of soft, shimmering metallic ballet slippers and an elastic hairband. Slippers with a scalloped top edge, glittery elastic strap over the foot, cotton jersey linings and insoles and soft, imitation suede soles. Hairband with a chiffon flower on top.
Fitted shirt in airy mesh with a collar, buttons down the front and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Cropped top in patterned mesh with short puff sleeves. Elastication and frill trims at the shoulders and sleeves, draped pleats front and back, and wide smocking at the back. Lined.
Top in airy cotton jersey with a wide neckline and two flounces in woven fabric on the sleeves.
Long-sleeved bodysuits in soft, ribbed organic cotton jersey with lapped shoulders and press-studs at the crotch.
Sandals with wrapover straps at the front and an adjustable fastening at the heel. Imitation leather insoles, and imitation cork wedge heels with rubber soles. Platform front 4.5 cm, heel 12.5 cm.

Sleeveless jumpsuit in soft jersey made from a viscose blend with narrow, braided shoulder straps and a braided trim around the neckline. Double layer at the top, an elasticated seam at the waist and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Trainer socks in a soft, fine-knit cotton blend.
Baby Exclusive. Skirt in soft, fine-knit organic cotton with frill-trimmed straps that cross at the back and decorative buttons at the front.
Sleeveless dress in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a print motif on the front.
Playsuit in soft jersey made from an organic cotton blend with elastication and a wide flounce at the top and an elasticated seam at the waist.
Vest top in soft organic cotton jersey with a chest pocket.
Round sunglasses in metal decorated with pearly plastic beads. Tinted, UV-protective lenses.
Loafers in soft imitation leather with a moccasin seam at the front. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles. Heel 1.5 cm.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets. Low crotch and tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Joggers in soft, rib-knit jersey made from a viscose blend with a lightly brushed finish. Elasticated drawstring waist.

Short, fitted dress in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a V-neck front and back and narrow shoulder straps. Sewn-in wrapover at the front and a seam at the waist with a sewn-in tie belt at the side.
5-pocket, slim-fit, knee-length shorts in washed, superstretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and raw-edge hems.
Short jacket in woven fabric with a stand-up collar, jersey-lined drawstring hood and a zip down the front. Long sleeves with elasticated cuffs, welt side pockets and a drawstring hem. Lined.

Empire-line dress in an airy, patterned cotton weave with contrasting colour embroidery around the neckline and an opening with a pearly button at the back of the neck. Short butterfly sleeves trimmed with contrasting colour tassels.
Calf-length, fitted dress in soft cotton jersey with a polo neck and long sleeves.
Calf-length dress in stretch, patterned mesh. Draped bodice with pleats at the sides, a seam at the waist and raw edges at the cuffs and hem. Jersey-lined bodice and jersey underskirt.
Straight-cut jersey T-shirt in a linen and cotton blend.

Shirt in cotton twill with a button-down collar with concealed buttons, a classic front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Soft cotton jersey T-shirt in a slightly wider fit with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves and a straight-cut hem.
Hooded top in cotton jersey with long raglan sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Metal bangle decorated with a chain and pendants.
Long-sleeved shirt in checked cotton flannel with a collar, buttons down the front, a chest pocket with a button, and a gently rounded hem.
5-pocket, slim-fit trousers in soft, superstretch twill with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button and narrow hems.

Non-wired bandeau bra in microfibre and lace with moulded, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and a wide hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Shorts in soft, printed jersey with covered elastication and decorative bow at the waist, a small frill trim at the top and side pockets.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Lined hood with a wrapover front, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Cotton canvas trainers with jersey and imitation leather details, a moccasin seam, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Canvas linings and insoles and rubber soles.
T-shirt in soft, printed slub cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.

Lightly padded parka in woven fabric with a brushed velvety finish. Detachable, lined hood with a quilted edge and fake drawstring with leather details, a stand-up collar, zip with a chin guard and wind flap with toggles. Patch front pockets with a flap and button, fake welt chest pockets, a small appliqué on one sleeve, inner ribbing at the cuffs and a single back vent. Removable lining.
Set with swim shorts and a patterned swim top in UV-protective fabric. Top with long sleeves and a frill trim at the hem. Shorts with an elasticated drawstring waist and lined crotch. UPF 50.
Voluminous skirt in tulle and patterned organza with a glittery elastic waistband. Lining in a cotton weave.
Pyjama bottoms in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Shorter, hooded top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric in a relaxed fit with low dropped shoulders and ribbed cuffs. Slightly longer at the back.
Gently tailored, double-breasted jacket in woven fabric with notch lapels, welt front pockets with a flap and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Lined.
Short-sleeved sports top in fast-drying functional fabric.
Hipster briefs in microfibre with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and cutaway coverage at the back.
Blouse in an airy cotton weave with short, flounced sleeves and an opening with a button at the back of the neck. Pin-tucks at the top, and a flounce around the neckline.

Trainers with imitation leather details, a lightly padded top edge, elasticated lacing and a hook and loop tab at the front, and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and thermoplastic rubber (TPR) soles.
Dress in glossy jersey with a print motif on the front, 3/4-length sleeves, a seam at the waist and a lined, layered tulle skirt with an asymmetric hem.
Ballet pumps with a loop at the back. Satin linings and insoles and fluted soles with a small heel.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with a small fabric appliqué on the turned-up hem.
Long-sleeved polo-neck jumper knitted in soft lambswool with ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

Short dress in an airy weave with a deep, flounce-trimmed V-neck and sewn-in wrapover with a concealed press-stud at the front. Short puff sleeves with smocking and frill trims, and flounced trims down the front and around the hem. Jersey lining.
Jumper in a soft rib knit containing some wool with a high collar, zip at the top, dropped shoulders and long sleeves.

Ankle-length suit trousers in woven fabric with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, welt back pockets with a button and legs with creases. Skinny Fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
5-pocket shorts in washed denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and slim legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Straight-cut jersey T-shirt in a relaxed fit with a round neck.

Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with an opening and woven ties at the back of the neck, gathers in the sides for a good fit over the tummy and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Hipster briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.
Sandals with appliqués on the front, a hook and loop fastener, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles.
V-neck blouse in an airy weave with short, wide dolman sleeves and slits in the sides. Longer at the back.
Shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a gently rounded hem.
Fine-knit tights in a cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Elasticated velour scrunchies.

Calf-length dress in an airy, patterned weave with an opening and narrow ties at the top, 3/4-length sleeves with narrow elastication and a frill at the cuffs, a smocked seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Jersey inner dress.

Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with a shimmering reversible sequin motif on the front (size 2-3Y with normal sequins). High collar, a zip at the top with a round tab,and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Biker jacket in soft imitation suede with a collar, decorative buttons on the lapels and a diagonal zip down the front. Long sleeves with a zip at the cuffs, zipped side pockets, a small flap pocket with a press-stud at the front and a decorative tab and button at the sides. Satin lining.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in lace with chiffon appliqués, a V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Gathered seam at the waist, zip at the back and a gently flared skirt. Jersey lining.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit with an appliqué on the turned-up hem.
Long, fine-knit cardigan in a soft viscose blend with long sleeves and ribbed cuffs. No buttons.
Cardigan in soft, ribbed jersey with a small stand-up collar, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Jeans in stretch, supersoft denim. Skinny fit through the hip, thigh and leg. Adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Lined, non-wired bikini top with padded cups and removable inserts that shape the bust and provide good support. Narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back, and ties front and back.
Boots in imitation suede with faux fur linings and insoles and fluted soles.
Jacket in soft sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Ankle-length trousers in woven fabric with elastication at the back of the waist, a zip fly and a hook-and-eye fastener. Side pockets and legs with creases and short slits at the hems.
5-pocket shorts in stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and sewn-in turn-ups at the hem. Slim fit.
Gently flared, calf-length skirt in soft imitation leather. High waist with a double-layered waistband, and a concealed zip and press-studs at one side. Unlined.
Glittery swimming goggles with decorative rubber appliqués and an adjustable silicone strap at the back.
